titles.title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a new ZIP Code for certain communities in Wisconsin.
To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a new ZIP Code for certain communities in Wisconsin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for each of Village of Somers, Village of Mount Pleasant, and Village of Caledonia, Wisconsin.
